research_fields.name: Automation
research_fields.description: This field refers to all the works automating any aspect of robotic surgery in order to improve the surgical workflow or to optimize the performance in a certain task.

research_fields.name: Training, skill assessment and gesture recognition
research_fields.description: Publications where new training platforms and protocols were designed and evaluated, as well as research efforts towards learning enhancement by multi-sensory training augmentation, skill assessment, and workflow analysis.

research_fields.name: Hardware implementation and integration
research_fields.description: All works that have contributed to develop the dVRK system, as well as further modifications of its software and hardware to make surgery more affordable and capable to interface with other surgical equipment.

research_fields.name: System simulation and modelling
research_fields.description: Studies that focused on the integration of the dVRK into simulation environments, optimizing simulation to obtain realistic robot interactions, and robot parametrization.

research_fields.name: Imaging and vision
research_fields.description: Publications related to the processing of images acquired by the endoscopic camera, including camera calibration, detection, segmentation, tracking, spatial mapping, and image augmentation.

research_fields.name: Reviews
research_fields.description: Review papers that cite the dVRK platform.

data_types.name: Raw Images
data_types.description: The left and right video stream from the da Vinci stereo endoscope or any other cameras

data_types.name: Kinematic Data
data_types.description: Information associated to the kinematics of the dVRK (including ECM, MTMs, PSMs and SUJ)

data_types.name: Dynamic Data
data_types.description: Information associated to the dynamics of the dVRK (including ECM, MTMs, PSMs)

data_types.name: System Data
data_types.description: Data associated to the robot teleoperation states, as signals coming from foot pedals, head sensor for operator presence detection, etc.

data_types.name: External Data
data_types.description: All data associated with additional technologies that were used along with the dVRK, such as eye trackers, force sensors, different imaging technologies, etc.

dvrk_site.name: Sheikh Zayed Institute for Pediatric Surgical Innovation
